name: Virtela
description:
Virtela, recognized by more than 100 awards for outstanding service innovation and customer support, is the smart alternative to traditional global carriers and equipment vendors for enterprise networking and virtualized IT services. The company delivers services via its Virtualized Overlay Network and Virtela Enterprise Services Cloud (ESC) platform, which enables the transition of branch office networking and security services to the cloud.
Virtela gives enterprises the benefit of “asset-light” software-defined networking that delivers up to 80% cost savings in upfront capital and 30% savings in ongoing operating expenses. Virtela is headquartered in Denver, Colorado, with global support centers around the world.
